name: Content Planner & Calendar - Notion template
description: Plan, create and organize all your content in one place. Get your content strategy to the next level and grow your audience easily with this Notion template. What you'll get? One simple and powerful template to organize all your content. ✔️ 10 preconfigured channels with templates ✔️ Dashboards for each channel ✔️ Content Idea Hub ✔️ Content Pipeline (Kanban board) ✔️ Calendar views Manage every piece of content you want to create for all your distribution channels. ✔️ LinkedIn ✔️ Twitter ✔️ You

rawData.description: Plan, create and organize all your content in one place. Get your content strategy to the next level and grow your audience easily with this Notion template. What you'll get? One simple and powerful template to organize all your content. ✔️ 10 preconfigured channels with templates ✔️ Dashboards for each channel ✔️ Content Idea Hub ✔️ Content Pipeline (Kanban board) ✔️ Calendar views Manage every piece of content you want to create for all your distribution channels. ✔️ LinkedIn ✔️ Twitter ✔️ YouTube ✔️ Facebook ✔️ Instagram ✔️ Pinterest ✔️ TikTok ✔️ Blog ✔️ Newsletter ✔️ Podcast F.A.Q. Does this template work with Notion’s free plan? Yes. This template will perfectly work if you are on Notion’s free plan. There are absolutely no limitations for personal use. You will even be able to use it with a small team, as Notion Personal plan allows you to share pages with 5 guests. Can I personalize my template? Of course! Once you duplicate the template into your Notion workspace, you are free to make any changes you like. You can customize your databases, views, and dashboards to your liking. What will happen after my purchase? Right after your purchase, you will be redirected to the Notion welcome page of the template. You'll get access to the instructions page and the actual template. You will be able to duplicate everything into your own Notion workspace. About the creators Hey, we are Valentin and Quentin, Notion Certified and cofounders of the Notion templates marketplace Notion Everything. © 2023 NotionEverything. All rights reserved.
